persona.name: Sofia Nguyen
persona.role: Operations Lead, e-commerce warehouse (30 staff, high uptime needs)
persona.goal: Add a backup connection and confirm best-fit business internet plan; schedule a callback
persona.context: Shipping scanners and cloud systems fail during outages; experienced a recent downtime event and needs a solution quickly

intent.name: Request Business Internet Quote & Callback
intent.description: A new business prospect wants pricing/plan info for business internet and to talk to sales.
intent.goal: Share business details and schedule a callback appointment with a sales agent.
intent.initialMessage: Hi, I’m setting up internet for my shop—can someone call me with pricing and options?

emotion.name: Skeptical
emotion.description: Challenges claims, asks for proof or confirmation, references past bad experiences, and questions pricing or reliability.

turns.content: Hi, I’m setting up internet for my warehouse and I need a backup connection too. Can someone walk me through business plans, pricing, and get a call scheduled?
I can get a Business Class agent to walk you through plans, pricing, and set up a call. May I have your name and confirm this is for a business location?

messages: I can get a Business Class agent to walk you through plans, pricing, and set up a call. May I have your name and confirm this is for a business location?

turns.content:
Yes, it’s for a business location.  
Name’s Sofia Nguyen, I’m the Operations Lead for an e‑commerce warehouse. What else do you need from me to get to the right plans and schedule a call?
Great, Sofia. To set the appointment, could you share your preferred date, time, and timezone?

messages: Great, Sofia. To set the appointment, could you share your preferred date, time, and timezone?

turns.content:
Let’s do tomorrow at 3:00 pm Pacific.  

Before you lock that in, will this be a proper sales consult where they can talk backup options and actual pricing, not just generic info?

Yes, tomorrow’s a sales consult where they’ll cover backup options and pricing. You’re set for January 14, 2026, 3:00 PM PT. You’ll get a text with the number to call about 5 minutes before the appointment. Anything else I can help with?

messages: Yes, tomorrow’s a sales consult where they’ll cover backup options and pricing. You’re set for January 14, 2026, 3:00 PM PT. You’ll get a text with the number to call about 5 minutes before the appointment. Anything else I can help with?

turns.content:
Okay, that’s fine.  

Two quick things before we’re done:  
1) How long is the consult usually, so I can block the right time?  
2) Are they going to need anything from me in advance (current provider, bill, bandwidth needs, etc.) so we don’t waste half the call?

The consult usually runs about 30‑45 minutes, so you can block half an hour.  
They’ll want your current provider details, a recent bill, desired bandwidth, and backup requirements.  
That’s all you need to have ready for a focused call.

messages:
The consult usually runs about 30‑45 minutes, so you can block half an hour.  
They’ll want your current provider details, a recent bill, desired bandwidth, and backup requirements.  
That’s all you need to have ready for a focused call.

turns.content:
Got it, I’ll have all that ready.  

Last thing: will they also be able to quote install timelines on that call? We just had an outage last week, so I need a realistic ETA, not “it depends.” If yes, then I’m all set for tomorrow.
